description: Multiple untrusted search path vulnerabilities in the (1) Presentation, (2) Writer, and (3) Spreadsheets components in Kingsoft Office 2010 6.6.0.2477 allow local users to gain privileges via a Trojan horse plgpf.dll file in the current working directory, as demonstrated by a directory that contains a .xls, .ppt, .rtf, or .doc file.  NOTE: some of these details are obtained from third party information.
